properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 4:08AM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Cameron LA to High Island TX from 20 to 60
NM.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SUNDAY
